nodes.text: The Hanger Market was a marketplace located in Foamwander City on the Outer Rim planet Dac. The city was almost entirely made up of docking bays which all led to the marketplace. At the Hangar Market, most commerce was conducted by merchants and traders who sold their goods in bulk. It was considered rude at the market to pay full price for goods without negotiating first.
The Hanger Market was mentioned in Strongholds of Resistance, a 2015 sourcebook for Fantasy Flight Games's Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
